nodes.description: 巴勒斯坦自杀式爆炸袭击以色列酒店餐厅，造成20人死亡、130余人受伤
nodes.support_text: following the Palestinian suicide bombing that killed 20 diners in a hotel restaurant. More than 130 others were injured during a Passover Seder

nodes.description: 以色列军方指挥官与国防部长就袭击事件举行紧急会议
nodes.support_text: army commanders met Israel's defence minister this morning

edges.support_text: following the Palestinian suicide bombing that killed 20 diners in a hotel restaurant
